title: Job Club - AI Career Accelerator (NJIT)
description: Student-facing AI career accelerator for NJIT students to become AI consultants, startup founders, and AI-savvy developers with portfolio-first guidance.
author: NJIT Job Club

jobclub.tagline: Turn NJIT students into career-ready AI professionals.
jobclub.mission: Provide guided onboarding, mentor-backed sprints, and portfolio-first workflows so students can become AI consultants, founders, or AI-savvy developers.
